channel.title: How do i make it so admin cant trade
channel.description: well on my server owners couldnt trade so i edited the codes and then when i tryed to trade as owner i could but now it also lets admins trade... plz help

item.title: How do i make it so admin cant trade
item.dc:creator: @Infamous_Gangster Infamous Gangster
item.description:
@Infamous_Gangster wrote:

change it to 10.

or just delete the value.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make it so admin cant trade

item.title: How do i make it so admin cant trade
item.dc:creator: @smite_range smite range
item.description:
@smite_range wrote:

[quote=“jeddac, post:3, topic:296914”]I think you changed it from

if playerrights >=2

which would allow people who are rights 2/3 (admin/owner) to trade, so rewrite the command if you deleted it with

if playerrights =2[/quote]

no i changed from 3 - 2 and now both can trade

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make it so admin cant trade

item.title: How do i make it so admin cant trade
item.dc:creator: @jeddac jeddac
item.description:
@jeddac wrote:

I think you changed it from

if playerrights >=2

which would allow people who are rights 2/3 (admin/owner) to trade, so rewrite the command if you deleted it with

if playerrights =2

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make it so admin cant trade

item.title: How do i make it so admin cant trade
item.dc:creator: @Infamous_Gangster Infamous Gangster
item.description:
@Infamous_Gangster wrote:

delta = client.java

search for

cannot

it will come up with player rights change that to w.e or delete it.
